executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Alexiou Gibson pitched his company, The Transformation Factory, seeking $500,000 for 5% equity. After multiple offers and negotiations among the Sharks, Gibson secured a deal with Mark Cuban and Kevin Hart for $600,000 in exchange for 20% equity to help expand into retail and strengthen operational infrastructure.
keyDecisions: Alexiou Gibson accepted Mark Cuban and Kevin Hart’s joint offer of $600,000 for 20% equity in The Transformation Factory.

actionItems.task: Work with Mark Cuban and Kevin Hart to build retail distribution and operational infrastructure for The Transformation Factory.
Begin process of shelf-stabilizing CMOS gel products to prepare for retail expansion.
Develop financial and management systems with support from new partners.

nextSteps: Alexiou Gibson will collaborate with Mark Cuban and Kevin Hart to enhance production capabilities, create shelf-stable products, and expand The Transformation Factory’s presence from direct-to-consumer into retail markets.
